;+
; NAME:
;       RADAR_LIB
;
; PURPOSE:
;       This library of routines provides a number of general purpose
;       functions for working with radar data and other data.
;
; ROUTINES:
;
;       CNV_MDHMS_SEC   convert time from mo,day,hr,min,sec to year_sec
;       CNVTIME         convert time from mo,day,hr,min,sec to year_sec
;       CNV_SEC_MDHMS   convert time from year_sec to mo,day,hr,min,sec
;       CNVCOORD        convert coordinates to/from magnetic/geographic
;       MLT             calculate magnetic local time
;       MONDAY          calculates day of year from month and day of month
;                       or the inverse
;       ANGADJ          compute angle of rotation from geographic to
;                       magnetic coordinates
;       VECTPLT         general radar vector plotting routine
;
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
;
; the above mentioned routines can be found in the same named files
; with the .pro extension.
;
